author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Luoniushan's Preliminary 2017 Net Profit Up, Sees Q1 Net Profit Rising Strongly
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Luoniushan Co Ltd:
* SAYS PRELIM 2017 NET PROFIT UP 90.9 PERCENT Y/Y AT 152.5 MILLION YUAN ($24.28 million)
* SAYS IT EXPECTS Q1 NET PROFIT TO RISE 265.83-283.25 PCT Y/Y FROM 86.1 MLN YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS Q1 HOG SALES DOWN 12.6 PERCENT Y/Y AT 83.5 MILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2IT493D ; bit.ly/2qvsR2z ; bit.ly/2GXmr3c Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2798 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
